================
PSNBlockExplorer
================


A rich example of using the `block explore api <https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/PSNBlockExplorer>`_.

You can see it live in action at: `https://blocks.fusionnetwork.io/ <https://blocks.fusionnetwork.io/>`_.

And the source can be found on github at: `https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/PSNBlockExplorer <https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/PSNBlockExplorer>`_.
